sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
multiplies
ali
is multiplied
, se številčno ali količinsko zelo poveča.

seg.quote: The shops began to multiply, eventually springing up in almost every town in the area.

sense.def:
Kadar živali
multiply
, imajo veliko mladičev.

seg.quote: The creatures began to multiply very rapidly.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
multiplies one number by another
, izračuna, koliko dobi, če nekemu številu doda njegovo vrednost še večkrat. Na primer, 2 krat 3 je 2 plus 2 plus 2, torej 6.

seg.quote: Multiply this figure by the number of years you have worked.
